entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-10
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • cant get windows authentication credentials via defaultcredentials #47143
  • Conditionally provided parameters in Blazor's razor syntax #47142
  • [QuickGrid] Consider using reflection to avoid having to box every value (PropertyColumn Format). #47141
  • [QuickGrid] Don't use scoped CSS for QuickGrid.razor #47140
  • [QuickGrid] Reevaluate the number of rows on the last page of a Virtualized QuickGrid #47139
  • [QuickGrid] Consider making debouncing requests configurable, or smarter. #47138
  • [QuickGrid] Miscellaneous TODOs #47137
  • adding PhysicalFileProvider causes 404 on other static files #47136
  • Issue with running hosted Blazer WebAssembly app caused by props file contents #47135
  • Having parity between IParsable support in RDF and RDG #47134
  • Consider breaking API change for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Mvc.Rendering.RenderMode #47133
    8.0-preview3
  • Possible request delegate generator bug with non-valid C# identifier names #47129
  • .NET Core Hosting is corrupted after sysprep #47128
  • HttpContext.Response.ContentLength return null (with System.Text.Json) #47127
  • Add option to refresh the claims of a logged in user from UserInfo endpoint #47125
  • dotnet watch epic fail on Ubuntu #47122
  • ApiConventionNameMatch doesn't work as expected #47120

Closed

  • Consider setting InvariantGlobalization in api template #47029
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Based on cell value changing color #47015
  • Assigning an object with implicit operator (cast to string) to Blazor component's parameter causes InvalidCastException #18042
    8.0-preview3
  • aspnetcore-ci release/7.0 failed #47132
  • [NETE2ESDK]With NET 7.0.0 windows server hosting installed, the hyperlink for "here" on installer UI is 6.0 link not 7.0 link. #44615
    8.0-preview2
  • Blazor United: SSR endpoint implementation #46988
    8.0-preview3
  • LocalStorage reading on AuthenticationStateProvider causes infinite redirection loop #47019

PullRequests

Created

  • Enable nullability in RDG and fix warnings #47144
    area-runtime
  • [Blazor] Endpoint discovery #47126
    area-blazor
  • Fix x86 folder contents in ARM64 Windows Server Hosting Bundle installer #47124
    area-infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix verb in route template with gRPC transcoding #47123
    area-grpc
  • DbContextHealthCheck handles exceptions thrown by CustomTestQuery #47121
    area-healthchecks, community-contribution

Merged

  • [release/7.0] Fail client result if client can't parse invocation argument(s) #47003
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.5
  • Set InvariantGlobalization in api template #47066
    area-mvc, 8.0-preview3
  • Backport SignalR test changes #46648
    area-signalr, tell-mode, 7.0.5
  • [release/6.0] Source-build: Allow setting KnownAppHostPack and KnownRuntimePack #46735
    area-infrastructure, tell-mode, community-contribution, 6.0.16
  • [release/7.0] Fix canceling flush of CancelInvocation when canceling server-to-client stream #47099
    Servicing-approved, area-signalr, 7.0.5
  • Follow up on IParsable changes and update tests #47102
    area-runtime, 8.0-preview3
  • Razor Component endpoint implementation #47117
    area-blazor, 8.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `cead3d5` to `50e07d1` #47130
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/spa-templates from `c8375a9` to `9395d4e` #47131
    area-infrastructure, 8.0-preview3

Updated

  • Add FieldIdentifier Indexer handling #41628
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution, blog-candidate
  • Only invoke 'IsService' check once in resolution #47097
    area-runtime
  • Ability to monitor Blazor Server circuit activity #46968
    area-blazor
  • Add support for F# `Async<'T>` as an awaitable type in minimal APIs #46898
    community-contribution, area-web-frameworks, pending-ci-rerun
  • RDG array handling. #47086
    area-runtime
